column4: the page i following dont work :( keep getting the same error

the problem is with the preinst script, do you have that deb, maybe you can link to it

ok and sudo apt-get install proftpd does what
there is more I would hope
pasted it to you in a pm as it would spam this chat
remove their .desktop file from /usr/share/applications
close synaptic
done
re run the command
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/14628/
do this "echo \#\!/bin/bash | sudo tee -a /var/lib/dpkg/info/gforge-db-postgresql.prerm && sudo apt-get remove gforge-db-postgresql"
don't do that
do this "echo \#\!/bin/bash | sudo tee /var/lib/dpkg/info/gforge-db-postgresql.prerm && sudo apt-get remove gforge-db-postgresql"
I had it set to append, it shouldn't append
did you try the command?
and it worked?
sudo apt-get remove gforge-db-postgresql worked?
the last command
thats worked and solved the problem earlyer thanks
